snippet: DraftKings and FanDuel had sought orders that would have blocked attempts by the state’s attorney general to shut down the businesses there.
abstract: New York State Supreme Court Judge Manuel Mendez rejects requests by DraftKings and FanDuel for temporary restraining orders to halt Atty Gen Eric T Schneiderman's efforts to shut down daily fantasy sports betting in state.
lead_paragraph: DraftKings and FanDuel had sought orders that would have blocked attempts by the state’s attorney general to shut down the businesses there.

headline.main: Judge Rebuffs Fantasy Sports Sites in New York
headline.print_headline: Judge Rebuffs Fantasy Sports Sites in New York
